name: api_animation_AnimatorStateInfo
description: Runtime information on the current or next animation state, managed by an Animator.

properties.name: fullPathHash
properties.description: The full path hash for this state.

properties.name: shortNameHash
properties.description: The hash is generated using Animator.StringToHash. The hash does not include the name of the parent layer.

properties.name: speed
properties.description: The playback speed of the animation. 1 is the normal playback speed.

properties.name: speedMultiplier
properties.description: The speed multiplier for this state.
